newsitem.title: UK: Hong Kong stocks little changed in London.
newsitem.headline: Hong Kong stocks little changed in London.

text.p: Hong Kong stocks were little changed in London in featureless trading.
The Hang Seng London Reference Index was off 1.85 points at 11,075.10 at 1346 GMT.

"There's no business. No one wants to go chasing stocks now," said one trader, noting that futures settled at a discount to the spot market in Hong Kong. The Hang Seng Index closed 119.77 points higher at 11,076.95.
The lack of direction in the U.S. stock and bond market also tempered interest in Hong Kong stocks here, the trader said.
